title: Macaw 1.5 – The code-savvy web design tool
content: Stop writing code. Start drawing it.   Macaw provides the same flexibility as your favorite image editor but also writes semantic HTML and remarkably succinct CSS. title: Espionage 3.6 – Simple, state of the art encryption and plausible deniability for your data

title: Blink Pro 3.9.1 – Provides IM/file transfer functionality based on SIP SIMPLE

title: Eagle 6.5.0 – Schematic capture and printed circuit board design
content: Eagle Layout Editor is a schematic capture and printed circuit board design package that runs in the X11 application environment.   Version 6.5.0: Consistency Checking: Added full consistency check of packages to avoid misleading informations used e.g., for DesignLink.
